# get_task_status

Retrieve task status from Polaris

```py
def get_task_status(self, task_chain_id):
```

## Arguments

| Name        | Type | Description                                                                 | Choices |
|-------------|------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------|
| task_chain_id  | str | Task Chain UUID from request |  |


## Returns

| Type | Return Value                                                                                  |
|------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| str | Task state |
